name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2: Battle Nexus
name_original: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2: Battle Nexus
description:
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2: Battle Nexus is an arcade, fighting and platformer game developed by Konami Digital Entertainment. It was originally released in 2004. It was published by Konami. On review aggregator Metacritic, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2: Battle Nexus has a score of 49. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2: Battle Nexus on PlayStation 2, PC, Game Boy Advance and Xbox.
Yasushi Kawasaki produced the game. It was directed by Naomi Kaneda. Masanori Akita and Yuichi Tsuchiya scored the game.
